name: RunZ
description:
RunZ is a fast paced action driving game where the player is driving a zombie-killer van with spikes and his goal is to hit as much green suckers as possible.

The van runs out of gas, so it's good if you can collect the canister every now and then. Also, if you hit other objects - the van will get broken. That's why you should collect wrench marks on your way - to repair the van.

Focus, buckle up and get driftin'!
